name: WooCommerce PulzePay
author: Sia How / Lee Teck Khen / Reeve Perk

sections.description:
This is an PulzePay WooCommerce plugin

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.7 or greater
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘woocommerce-pulzepay’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Release

1.0.1

  • Release date: 30 May, 2018
  • WordPress 4.9.6 fixes.

1.0.2

  • Fixed – Display twice in plugin page for WordPress 5.x

1.0.3

  • Changed – Success payment will return to order received page

1.0.4

  • Changed – Change form submit URL, direct pass to pulzepay

1.0.5

  • Tested with WordPress 5.5 and WooCommerce 4.2. Update some code changed in new version of WooCommerce.

1.0.6

  • Change callback url

1.0.7

  • Add new fields

screenshots.caption: This screen shot description corresponds to screenshot-1.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif). Note that the screenshot is taken from the /assets directory or the directory that contains the stable readme.txt (tags or trunk). Screenshots in the /assets directory take precedence. For example, /assets/screenshot-1.png would win over /tags/4.3/screenshot-1.png (or jpg, jpeg, gif).
